title: Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
description: The bug report is missing a description section. Please provide a detailed description of the bug.
OB: The 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress) replaces the package name 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar'.
EB: I discovered that package name compression replaces the fragment even if the compressed name is not smaller. For example, 'com.ibm.foobar' is replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar'. I believe package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is actually smaller.
